com.googlecode.aluminumproject.serialisers.xml
Class XmlElementNameTranslator

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.serialisers.xml.XmlElementNameTranslator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementNameTranslator
public class XmlElementNameTranslator
extends Object
implements ElementNameTranslator

The default element name translator. It replaces all spaces in a name with hyphens.
